title: Charlie's chilli con carne
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '1 garlic, crushed', '300 to 500g 95% lean beef mince', '1 red or green pepper, chopped', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 to 2 tablespoons ground cumin', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 to 2 tablespoons chilli powder, hot or mild', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 tin kidney beans']
